Name: Fingerspelling Unleashed - BANZSL Edition
About the game: Fingerspelling Unleashed â€“ BANZSL Edition Fingerspelling itself is using hand movements to spell out words that do not have an established sign. It is commonly used to spell out the names of people or places. This Edition of the game focuses on teaching you BANZSL, which is short for British Sign Language (BSL), Australian Sign Language (AUSLAN) & New Zealand Sign Language (NZSL). All three languages use the same two handed sign language fingerspelling alphabet. Game Features Low system requirements. User Friendly Interface. Relaxing piano melodies. A game saving system. Fun Mini Games (see below) Type To Defend Typing game with a twist! Identify and Type Can you identify the word? Word Search Like Word Searches? Find them too easy? Then try this!
